name: k6-performance-testing-framework
description: Professional k6 performance testing framework for SOAP web services

scripts.start: npm run grafana:start && npm run grafana:open
scripts.grafana:clean: docker exec k6-influxdb influx -execute "DROP DATABASE k6; CREATE DATABASE k6"
scripts.help: echo. && echo === k6 Performance Testing Framework === && echo. && echo INICIAR/PARAR: && echo   npm start              - Inicia Grafana y abre dashboard && echo   npm stop               - Detiene Grafana && echo. && echo TESTS PRINCIPALES: && echo   npm run smoke          - Test de humo && echo   npm run load           - Test de carga && echo   npm run stress         - Test de estres && echo   npm run capacity       - Test de capacidad && echo   npm run spike          - Test de picos && echo   npm run soak           - Test de remojo && echo   npm run combined       - SOAP + Traffic en paralelo && echo. && echo TRAFFIC MONITORING: && echo   npm run traffic:smoke  - Traffic smoke test && echo   npm run traffic:load   - Traffic load test && echo. && echo UTILIDADES: && echo   npm run clean          - Limpia datos de Grafana && echo   npm run grafana:open   - Abre el dashboard && echo   npm run help           - Muestra esta ayuda && echo.

author: Performance Engineering Team
